body: Remember the first few days playing minecraft?
body_tagged: Remember the first few days playing minecraft?
title: Remembering your start

replies.body: Oh, yeah. It was amazing. I'd  have to play on tiny render distance with like 11 FPS, and never played multiplayer because our internet was garbage. I'd make box houses and would always play on peaceful because I was a wuss, haha.
replies.body_tagged: Oh, yeah. It was amazing. I'd  have to play on tiny render distance with like 11 FPS, and never played multiplayer because our internet was garbage. I'd make box houses and would always play on peaceful because I was a wuss, haha.

replies.body: I joined Multiplayer first and I actually joined this server when it was walls at the time haha. It was good times playing with my irl friend lol.
replies.body_tagged: I joined Multiplayer first and I actually joined this server when it was walls at the time haha. It was good times playing with my irl friend lol.

replies.body: I'd spent about a year of my life watching paulsoresjr play minecraft which I somehow found so amusing even though I didn't play the game but when I got the game I would just cheat in survival and say to my IRL friends: "I FOUND HEROBRINE" , "I KILLED THE ENDERDRAGON 20 TIMES" to look cool.
replies.body_tagged: I'd spent about a year of my life watching paulsoresjr play minecraft which I somehow found so amusing even though I didn't play the game but when I got the game I would just cheat in survival and say to my IRL friends: "I FOUND HEROBRINE" , "I KILLED THE ENDERDRAGON 20 TIMES" to look cool.

replies.body: I think the first thing I did was go on a survival world and build a base in a mountain while I searched the Minecraft wiki for info about everything. xD
replies.body_tagged: I think the first thing I did was go on a survival world and build a base in a mountain while I searched the Minecraft wiki for info about everything. xD

replies.body: I built a house found some diamonds and made my first redstone creation which was a trap door controlled by an XOR gate with two levers lol.
replies.body_tagged: I built a house found some diamonds and made my first redstone creation which was a trap door controlled by an XOR gate with two levers lol.

replies.body: LOL. It wasn't even my account. My brother left his computer open and I just flew around for 30 secs before running away.
replies.body_tagged: LOL. It wasn't even my account. My brother left his computer open and I just flew around for 30 secs before running away.

replies.body: Yep I was playing the cracked "version" and I spawned in a jungle (Singeplayer). After a few weeks I think I joined a random server but I didn't know what to do on there lol. My second server I joined used to be my favorite server but like on Avicus, I got banned several times permanently for trying to hack the server and do bad stuff. xD The server closed years ago :(

My second server I joined used to be my favorite server but like on Avicus, I got banned several times permanently for trying to hack the server and do bad stuff. xD The server closed years ago :(

replies.body: I played on singleplayer for a few months cause I didn't know what I was doing. Then when I joined McZone I broke my own monument (no protection against that back then :/) cause I didn't know what I was doing.

replies.body: I watched Paul too for a few months, then when I finally got an account, I played on peaceful for the first few months and felt pretty stoked when I found gold. I tried boasting to my friends and they gave me a small clap and a laugh.

replies.body: Too long ago but I remember the old little lobby for skywars and walls and the red vs blue team skywars games

replies.body:
I remember my first single-player day, like it was yesterday. It was a summer of 2011, my yard friends always talked about some strange game, Minecraft. I didn't want to start playing, till they told me, that it made of blocks and you can do everything there. OMG, SANDBOX GAME. 
I went home and installed cracked 1.7.3 beta version, created world with normal settings. I spawned somewhere on the beach near the forest. It was a beautiful day and I messed around with cute animals and square trees. But it started getting darker.
Wtf, night?! It was super dark, I didn't see anything and somehow went back to the beach. White shadow flashed in the forest. Who was that?!!! Am I alone?! No. Strange green someone without hands (!) walked up to me. Who are you, little cute mutant? KABOOM! It dropped some sand, as I thought. Then white shadow came out from the forest and started shooting me! (Later I understood, that it was Skeleton and Creeper, being who blown up my beach. WHAT'S WRONG WITH YOU, GAME?!)
I was super scared, began run away. Everything tried to kill me. I built half-dirt-half-sand box to hide there from evil surrounding, zombies and spider besieged me all night and in the morning I finally heard sounds of b̶i̶r̶d̶s̶ ̶s̶i̶n̶g̶i̶n̶g̶ zombies burning. Am I in the hell? Yes. That spider didn't want to burn or run away, he still remembered whom to kill (me)....
It was the great fight against the background of the rising sun (no). I won. Like human win nature. My first Minecraft day ended. My Minecraft life started.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
@peeps I used to check Paul's channel daily for another month or two to see if he uploaded another lets play after he'd pretty much ended it

I somehow succeeded in building a base inside a mountain with my 5 FPS but lost it before mom called me for dinner :(

replies.body: I had the millebere mod and I spawned in a bunch of stuff and killed some dude in his hut and used his chest then he respawned and I couldn't get any back, so I spawned in a fire block and lit his house on fire and the surrounding forest, died from the fire, respawned in the fire so I jumped into a little water pool and drowned cause I didn't know how to swim. I proceeded to rage quit xd, I used to just build random shit in creative and played on parkour and SG servers a lot though I was terrible at both (I'm sure this isn't my first day but it's the oldest thing I can remember)
replies.body_tagged: I had the millebere mod and I spawned in a bunch of stuff and killed some dude in his hut and used his chest then he respawned and I couldn't get any back, so I spawned in a fire block and lit his house on fire and the surrounding forest, died from the fire, respawned in the fire so I jumped into a little water pool and drowned cause I didn't know how to swim. I proceeded to rage quit xd, I used to just build random shit in creative and played on parkour and SG servers a lot though I was terrible at both (I'm sure this isn't my first day but it's the oldest thing I can remember)

replies.body:
I used to play on 2003 com meaning I needed to play on small screen lowest fps...

I tried to play on avicus and at the time had a record 6 kills 875 deaths...

Back in the days man

Oh yeah my first "accomplishment" was shooting a bow and hitting someone on Venomous DTM on my friends account before I even had the game.

reply_to.body:
I remember my first single-player day, like it was yesterday. It was a summer of 2011, my yard friends always talked about some strange game, Minecraft. I didn't want to start playing, till they told me, that it made of blocks and you can do everything there. OMG, SANDBOX GAME. 
I went home and installed cracked 1.7.3 beta version, created world with normal settings. I spawned somewhere on the beach near the forest. It was a beautiful day and I messed around with cute animals and square trees. But it started getting darker.
Wtf, night?! It was super dark, I didn't see anything and somehow went back to the beach. White shadow flashed in the forest. Who was that?!!! Am I alone?! No. Strange green someone without hands (!) walked up to me. Who are you, little cute mutant? KABOOM! It dropped some sand, as I thought. Then white shadow came out from the forest and started shooting me! (Later I understood, that it was Skeleton and Creeper, being who blown up my beach. WHAT'S WRONG WITH YOU, GAME?!)
I was super scared, began run away. Everything tried to kill me. I built half-dirt-half-sand box to hide there from evil surrounding, zombies and spider besieged me all night and in the morning I finally heard sounds of b̶i̶r̶d̶s̶ ̶s̶i̶n̶g̶i̶n̶g̶ zombies burning. Am I in the hell? Yes. That spider didn't want to burn or run away, he still remembered whom to kill (me)....
It was the great fight against the background of the rising sun (no). I won. Like human win nature. My first Minecraft day ended. My Minecraft life started.
